nav.div: Bradford Area School District » District » Health Services » Coronavirus Information

div.div:
As new cases of coronavirus (COVID-19) are announced in the U.S. every day, the Bradford Area School District wants to communicate frequently with you to provide facts and helpful guidance because your child’s health and safety are our highest priority. Provided in the left menu are links to various resources to include information from the Bradford Area School District, the PA Department of Health and PA Department of Human Resources.
We recommend you periodically review this page and menu links to receive updated information.
